name: Tomb of the Sectagon
description:
Can you defeat the minoins of King Sectahedron and escape with the legendary Die of  Ra?

This game is heavily inspired by top down zelda games, but instead of a sword the hero is armed with a Dice. Whack baddies, solve, puzzles, and power up your dice to take down the King of the Tomb.

I built this in the unity engine and modeled all the art in Blender, the textures and UI elements where generated by DALL-E Mini, music and sfx from OpenGameArt.org;

WASD: Move

Space: Grab Die, Throw Die, Talk to NPCs
